I am more or less a novice at digital image making, printing, etc. I'm still stuck mentally on SLR and darkroom B/W. in my photo thinking. I do love this camera however. I don't use it on touch screen shooting mode, and use the button instead. I took some lovely landscapes, and some clear closeup indoor shots, I did have depth of field issues when indoor photographing a sculpture by Michelangelo, Some of the areas of the sculpture were sharp and others blurry. That was probably my own fault not having the settings made correctly? Anyway, overall this camera performs well for me in low light, and outdoors. I'm still learning how to use it, but that is due to my slowness, not the camera.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: William A. Horrell "Bill"
Reviews.Content: Love the small size and very high quality pictures. Works great on a neck strap. fits into most any pocket, or into my wife's purse!  The controls on the back screen are very easy to use. We love it!

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: E. Mossberger
Reviews.Content: Gave as a gift for my daughter, she loves this camera and uses it almost every day. nice product, easy to use

Reviews.Title: Fantastic little Nikon Camera S01 !!
Reviews.Author: chelsea
Reviews.Content: Bought 7 of these tiny Nikon Coolpix S01 cameras for Christmas 2012. They were the talk of the holidays, and everyone loved and enjoyed their gift. The entire family could not put them down. After the holidays my husband asked me to get him one. It is small and stylish and takes really great pictures if you use the button and not the touch screen. Sometimes you get movement touching the screen. You do not need a sd card or any card, and will have to use the enclosed the USB cable to load them into your computer. It is so easy and they loaded immediately. So if you like media cards this is not the camera for you. Charging is a breeze, just plug the camera into the wall, or into your computer. It has a fixed internal battery, so you do not have to lug around extra batteries. And WOW does it ever stay charged a long time! My husband uses his a lot and just charged it after 6 whole weeks. Of course if you are a real heavy user, you may have to plug yours in sooner. The flash is not very good at a far distance, so stay close to your subject when a flash is desired. I actually use the flash very little, and have always loved the non-flash pictures. Digitals just take such good pictures. Play around with this camera, and you will be able to create all kinds of pictures. Just remember, because of the size, there is only so much room to put things in the camera. Nikon has excelled in what was added, but it is more limited than a larger camera. This little beauty is a conversation piece. I love mine, and my husband and I carry it at all times. It is so cute, so tiny, and just plain fun to use !! Try one and see for yourself.

Reviews.Title: Small But Mighty
Reviews.Author: William Porubek
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my new camera as it is small enough to put in any pocket and takes excellent pictures and movies.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: jd
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  It can be taken anywhere.  Pictures and video are great.  Only thing that could be better is low light..  I'm still learning how to use it.  Things I thought it would not do, I'm finding it can do.Every thing about this camera that was claimed is true.Thanks,JDH

Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Good Photos
Reviews.Author: Harleygirl
Reviews.Content: I got this tiny camera for my husband because he backpacks and likes to take photos along the way, but he also wants to minimize size and weight of all that he is carrying.  Even though he has big hands and fingers, he manages to use this camera just fine and it takes good photos.  A drawback is that the battery is part of the camera itself and has to be recharged plugged into the computer, rather than carrying an extra replacement battery for long trips.  It's great that it saves money on batteries, but the internal battery dies before the camera is filled with pictures and before trips are over.  Overall, I like the camera and even though he doesn't get to take all the photos he wants day after day, it does take a lot of photos before the battery dies.

Reviews.Title: loved it!
Reviews.Author: Victoria
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera on a whim before a last minute trip to Miami. I needed something small and easy to use. I purchased a refurnished one and sofar so good! The picture quality is good and it is perfect for a quick vacation. The only thing I didnt like was that it does not use a memory card and I find it annoying to have to connect a cord to my computer.

Reviews.Title: Buy it for it's tiny, go anywhere size
Reviews.Author: Alex Boge "Computer Guru"
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is OK but it has an issue where it does not reliably fire the flash when in Auto mode (and you only have three to choose from, Auto, Off and Fill Flash). Even in a nearly dark environment it often doesn't flash and has to be manually set to Fill Flash. Other than that it works quite nicely. If you buy a camera this size at this price then you know it's about the convenience and not professional features :)

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S01
Reviews.Author: RodgerB
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for the following reasons:  Small size (fits in the watch/coin pocket of a pair of jeans); no external setting controls to accidentally change (all settings are changed on the touch screen when the home screen is selected; this was the primary reason for purchase); the zoom range (3x optical zoom plus an additional 4x digital zoom); built-in memory (7.3GB, about 4,000 photos); and built-in rechargeable battery (listed as 190 photos but I've taken well over 200 and didn't come close to discharging it).  I originally bought it for my wife to use (thinking it would replace a larger point and shoot what had too-easily changeable setting controls) in the silver color (the only color she liked since it didn't come in black), but when she used it, she said that all the corners were too rounded and it felt too slippery for her.  So she still uses her other camera, and that's why the 4-star rating instead of 5-star.  I carry and use it when I'm taking pictures of opportunity and my DSLR is too large and heavy to carry around.

Reviews.Title: Two thumbs up.
Reviews.Author: Blaine Derck
Reviews.Content: My wife is enjoying her gift and takes it with her wherever she goes. She's especially likes its small size.

Reviews.Title: Nice, Compact Camera
Reviews.Author: Roderick O Dressel
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter for Christmas, and she loves it! We have had several different Nikons in the past, so we know it will be a good camera.  She loves the bright pink color and the fact that it can fit in the pockets of her jeans without bulging.  The picture quality is impressive for such a small camera, and she is loving the touch screen options.

Reviews.Title: Its Small
Reviews.Author: Dan D.
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I thought it would take better photos than my Samsung Galaxy II.  I was wrong.  It has a narrow lens and a lot of the photos are blurry.  The lag time is long which probably leads to the photos being blurred.I gave it to my girls, they have fun with it but the photos are poor quality.I wish I could go back in time and not purchase this.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift
Reviews.Author: Barbara
Reviews.Content: My daughter loved her gift and has been using it constantly.  Pictures appear clear and detailed. I would definitely recommend this camera.  Good price also.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera, Amazingly Compact
Reviews.Author: Matthew Rutherford
Reviews.Content: Give the camera 5 stars for it's intended use:  An extremely pocket-able camera.  My girlfriend absolutely loves this camera!  She shows everyone how tiny it is.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Ana Moyer
Reviews.Content: I love it Cool camera if you like having it with you all the time well worth the money  thanks

Reviews.Title: Love this little Camera
Reviews.Author: Caryn F
Reviews.Content: First off you should know this is not a really fancy, super high quality/ resolution camera. My husband already has one of those. When purchasing this camera I was in the market for something small that I could throw in my purse or take on vacation and not have to fuss with. And I got exactly what I was looking for! This is a fun LITTLE and I mean LITTLE camera! It's seriously smaller than a credit card. The picture quality is what I expected. Great for everyday quick shots, and vacation photos. I would call the quality comprable if not a little better than the photos I get with my iphone4. The built in memory is also very convienent. And holds a ton of pictures. I like that I don't have to keep track of any cards.My only complaint is that it is not compatible with the ipad camera kit which would have been nice.If your looking for a nice alternative to using your smartphone camera all the time this is perfect. I got mine around christmas for around $100 which sits nicely with me. It's really a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera
Reviews.Author: Dennis
Reviews.Content: I have many cameras including some high end Nikon and Sony. This camera is just put it in your pocket and have fun taking snaps of the grand kids  I like it.

Reviews.Title: I love it for what it is
Reviews.Author: Mr. Phil Conley Sr. "nomad"
Reviews.Content: This is a fun little camera that takes up very little room in my pocket.  I can take it anywhere.  It is a lot more convienient than lugging around my D-90 and all the associated equipment.  For casual use it is perfect as long as you know its limitations.  I bought the silver (chrome) one for myself and the pink one for my wife.  It is a camera that she finds easy to use and gives acceptable results.

Reviews.Title: Super
Reviews.Author: Bobbie Kirby
Reviews.Content: Great handy camera. Small easy to carry. I recommend using shutter button though. You have to take a few pictures and make the settings that work for you.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Harold Olivares
Reviews.Content: Good camera to go around taking family pictures. Good quality, excellent price, I love this camera, you can storage up to 1800 pictures

Reviews.Title: Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Douglas E. Judson
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect very small digital camera.  It fits in your pocket so you can take it anywhere.  Has lots of storage and doesn't need an extra SD card.

Reviews.Title: Neat little camera
Reviews.Author: Frances  Doshier
Reviews.Content: I like the camera and am pleased with some iOf the pics.  I have not practiced enough and have not downloaded the manual, so will possibly like it better as I use it.  It is very sensitive to motion

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S01 Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Joanne Romanyk
Reviews.Content: The quality of the pictures for this size camera is amazing.  My 13-year old daughter loves it and took some fabulous pictures with it during our recent trip to London.  I would highly recommend it for those traveling and want to capture some great shots without carrying a heavy camera.

Reviews.Title: Unique Camera
Reviews.Author: J. Robnolt "retchap"
Reviews.Content: I read a review of this camera before I purchased it.  The review did not do it justice, even though it was positive.  This is the handiest camerea I have ever had -- apart from my micro-Minox of yesteryear -- for quick pictures everywhee.  It is about the size of a credit card and about the thickness of four or five.  The pictures are crystal clear -- unlike camera phone pics.  The small size fits in the pocket without bulk, and is ready to shoot a picture almost instantly.  I think I may buy another one as a gift.  I like the price.  It is a lot of camera for its price.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use
Reviews.Author: m
Reviews.Content: This camera is tiny so you need to get used to it.  I love it.  It is easy to use and has a video feature which was fun!

Reviews.Title: Very handy
Reviews.Author: Gary Gatdula
Reviews.Content: My wife really love the nikon coolpix s01. Instead of using her SLR camera she said it is very convenient to use this very light coolpix. I recommend this to the people who want tho fit their camera in their pocket.

Reviews.Title: COOLPIX Camera
Reviews.Author: Elfie
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera. I got it as a gift and they loved it too. Its so small, it can fit anywhere and I like the hot pink color. It was amazing how much I saved buying it on Amazon. I will probably have to buy myself one very soon.

Reviews.Title: So small! But perfect size for teens
Reviews.Author: SMF
Reviews.Content: My daughter was shown the camera prior to Christmas because of it's size. I was not sure she would like it because it was so small. But I never did get the camera back to put under the tree. She loved that there was no card and all the features it had in the compact size.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Thomas Richard Kennedy "Tom"
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera, takes good pics.easy to use, My only gripe is that it doesnt havea self timer

Reviews.Title: Great gift!
Reviews.Author: Randy Kiessig
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my sister, and she loves it!  It's a small, pocket sized camera with no memory card slot, but it's perfect for those who want a dedicated, non phone, camera.

Reviews.Title: Sweet!
Reviews.Author: D. Vick
Reviews.Content: This is the neatest and sweetest little camera.  Its the Instamatic of the digital camera revolution.  Not a lot of extra functions but takes great pictures.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Jahira
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend wanted a camera that he could take with him everywhere but still took good pictures so I bought him the Nikon and he loves it!

Reviews.Title: Bought for a friend of mine
Reviews.Author: D!reidea "D"
Reviews.Content: I bought it for my female friend, this is a very tiny case of camera. For myself, I don't really like it, too small for a guy. But she is pretty excited about it.

Reviews.Title: Good Little Camera
Reviews.Author: Leper
Reviews.Content: Small, compact, lightweight and it takes nice looking photos. Just what I was looking for, because my cellphone camera is only 3 mp with no flash and the battery life on my phone drains quickly. While I would not use this for photographing once in a lifetime events, track meets/sporting events or anything where you would need to capture your subject quickly--I would use it for routine trips and candid photos. I've taken pet portraits, outdoor shots and indoor shots and they came out great. The fill-in flash does help with the indoor photos as one reviewer mentioned. My only beef is with the Nikon case for the S01. It is way overpriced and badly designed (metal stud on the strap and peekaboo corners at the top of the case invites scratches & nicks) but I think that's because this camera is being marketed as more of a "fashion accessory." I did buy the pink one, but I would have purchased chrome if it hadn't looked so dull as pictured. I may buy another camera if the price goes down again.

Reviews.Title: Legit!!
Reviews.Author: Ray Framstad
Reviews.Content: awesome camera... great value for the money. The pictures are clear and a built in flash in a camera this small is nice

Reviews.Title: Small, sleek
Reviews.Author: metacyde
Reviews.Content: Works well, bought it as a gift for my baby sister, and she loves tiny electronic gadgets.  It's got great specs, so hopefully she'll like it.

Reviews.Title: Best new camera
Reviews.Author: Dianne
Reviews.Content: I have purchased many cameras over the years, but they are never where I need them when I want them.  So I started out looking for a very small drop-in-my pocket type of camera.  I FOUND IT !!!  This little camera is the best.  Right out of the box the printed directions were fast and easy to understand.  Easy warranty sign up.  When I went to look for the manual it was right there and easy to read and understand.  Windows7 is compatible with the S01 so I transferred my trial run without any need of extra software.  Printed nice pics.I saw a note from someone about needing a steady handy to use this S01 but I have to say I had no problems with any blurring.I found the instructions for the self-timmer and while it took a little while to perfect the way it takes pics it is great.I can see anyone using this camera.  We are bike riders and walkers and so often when we stop to rest I wish a camera had been handy now IT IS!!For the price I can't see it getting any better than the S01.And, of course, as always Amazon's delivery was right on target.

Reviews.Title: LOVE it! Perfect for having an alternative to the iphone camera.
Reviews.Author: Lauren
Reviews.Content: I got really sick of the iphone camera's crappy photos at night- the red eye issues and lack of clarity were annoying.  This is the perfect supplement if you want to have amazing photos but don't want to lug around a full sized camera.  I can't say anything negative about the camera.  I got the mirror silver which worried me because i thought the flash might be impacted by the mirrored finish- not at all.

Reviews.Title: Nikon S01 Doesn't Deliver
Reviews.Author: MikeJudyetc
Reviews.Content: Slow focus and shutter speed, woefully inadequate flash, blurry pics unless in good light.  Feels solid, certainly small and convenient, but who cares if the pictures stink?

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Author: Pat Thompson
Reviews.Content: I can carry it in my shirt pocket.  Works wondweful and is just what I expected.  Takes the place of a smart phone for taking pictures.  I don't have a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Great camera to buy
Reviews.Author: Roxie
Reviews.Content: Amazing, everything we could dream of in a camera. Great to take to big events and small enough to fit comfortably in our pockets. Also the best pricing from amazon. Everywhere else we went was very high in price and when it was on sale always out of stock.

Reviews.Title: Camera returned
Reviews.Author: Ken Ashley
Reviews.Content: Neat camera but not the features i was led to believe. Returned to Amazon andpurchased from you a Samsung WB150F with long zoom and Wi-FI.

Reviews.Title: Nikon credit card size camera
Reviews.Author: Lynn
Reviews.Content: Loved it, great color, size and user friendly,.  fits in my pocket as stated, shipped promptly yes yes yes yes

Reviews.Title: User friendly
Reviews.Author: Lester budilowsky
Reviews.Content: Camera is easy to program and is convenient to carry due to its small size must use included strap because of small size and slippery surface

Reviews.Title: So far so good and so little
Reviews.Author: Puddin N. Tain "pixgirl"
Reviews.Content: I saw this little gem and fell in love with it. I got it because  we travel a lot and I tire of toting all the tech stuff plus chargers. So, the size of this little number beat out some better features of other cameras - canons and Sonys.I think some of the pictures are a bit grainy, but I haven't put it to a real challenge yet. That should be in the next week. If I find some issues, I will revise.

Reviews.Title: Great Small Camera
Reviews.Author: Nancy S Soble
Reviews.Content: For such a small camera, it takes great pictures with excellent resolution. Very easy to get used to and so portable.

Reviews.Title: Very Cute handy camera!
Reviews.Author: Amazonuser "Amazonuser"
Reviews.Content: I get lots of compliments on it. Still need to learn how to get pics on computer... But very nice!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Erin Hilyer-Basso "Erin Hilyer"
Reviews.Content: Great little camera! Very handy to carry! Easy to use and takes great pictures. I would recommend to anyone. Fun to carry around.

Reviews.Title: First one defective, second one much better.
Reviews.Author: Paul B "PWB"
Reviews.Content: Got this as a gift for X-mas. It looks great but takes horrible pictures. Every single one is blurry and as other reviews have pointed out, it is slow to take the pic so you lose the good shot you wanted. The flash operates randomly...I have it set to auto and it will not flash in a completely dark room. Only operates if you set it to fill flash for every pic. Most pics have the subjects eyes closed, blurry and any lights in view have streaming tails. I would say one out of every 20 pics taken are remotely acceptable. Makes a good gift to a 2 year old I suppose. I'll stick with my Sony Cybershot which takes picture 110% better than this little toy. An iPhone takes better pics by far.***UPDATE***I took it back to the store where it was purchased and exchanged it for another silver S01 today. The new one one takes better pics, not blurred like the others. But the flash still does not function well. I would say the first one I had was defective. The pics are a huge improvement, therefore I am giving it 3 stars instead of the original one star.

Reviews.Title: Defective camera
Reviews.Author: R. Trujillo
Reviews.Content: When you turn on, the camera ask for format the memory, then freeze, and has to reset and ask for format and freeze again, is a loop, you have to reset and here como the format memory again. Not any photo was taken with this camera. This is the firs time that I received a damage article.

Reviews.Title: It's cute, but just okay...
Reviews.Author: Ecobian
Reviews.Content: The camara is very cute and small. Fits practically anywhere. I thought with all this new technology coming out that the picture would be just as good or better than pictures from a phone, but totally not the case.. The pics are just okay. Also, I got the silver color one and it all scratched up already. I should have gotten the red or white one...

Reviews.Title: Please, do yourself a favor and buy another camera.
Reviews.Author: Kristen
Reviews.Content: I don't care what camera you buy, just don't buy this one. It's super cute and I LOVE Nikon but my cell phone takes a better photograph than this. You're best bet is to go for a $100 Canon. You'll get a much better camera for the same price.

Reviews.Title: This is one of the worst things I've ever purchased
Reviews.Author: Burdenofhope
Reviews.Content: Well, the specs on these cameras didn't look so bad and the company bears a respectable name, so I went ahead and dropped the money on one of these little guys.The camera's shell is super cute. The interface is pretty easy to understand. The picture quality is laughable. Seriously, I have taken better pictures with the camera on my son's 3DS. Unless I was taking a picture of something within 3 feet of the camera, I ended up with grainy or blurry photos. I tried setting picture quality to the minimum and maximum, just to see if the camera somehow worked better at lower settings, and I could hardly tell the difference between a 2MP picture it was taking and a 10MP one.

Reviews.Title: Only one good thing about this camera
Reviews.Author: Sherry G
Reviews.Content: The one and only good thing about this camera is the size. The size is awesomely amazing.  You can stick this sucker in any pocket, even in the pocket of your tight jeans. Other than the size this camera is really just terrible. I am surprised by all the glowing reviews for this camera and wonder if those people are just used to taking crappy photos all the time. I got this camera for Christmas and have already returned it for a Canon Elph, which isn't much bigger and is vastly better at the same price. I have taken much better photos with my cameraphone (an old Blackberry Storm 2) than I managed to capture with this camera.I made sure this was the first gift I opened on Christmas morning so that I could use it to take photos of the festivities. These are the discoveries I made about the picture quality with the S01:1) Tiny flash = bad lighting. Unless your subject is exactly 3.5 - 4.5 feet away from you the flash is not strong enough to illuminate them. Any closer than 3.5 feet and they will be lit up like the sun; totally overexposed.2) Slow flash reaction. This is one of those cameras that has the crazy flash that I think is supposed to eliminate red eyes but it takes a million years to actually flash so by the time the shutter works the subject is no longer posing. It is utterly frustrating for the photographer as well as the people that are in the photo because a 'preflash' illuminates and the subject will think the photo has been taken when it will actually go off 5 to 10 seconds later. I have been told that if you hit the shutter button half way down to focus without releasing than take the photo the slow flash won't occur, but I had already returned the S01 before I had a chance to test that out.3) Subject must be still. If your subject moves at all the image will be blurred.  This camera cannot freeze movement.4) Despite the slow flash most subjects had red eyes. Big glowing red eyes. I did get one cool shot of my 2 year old niece that looks very similar to a young Damien. Extremely evil.Nearly all the photos I took were indoors in a well lighted room yet many of the photos are dark, yellow/orangish tinted, grainy, or overexposed. I took approximately 65 shots and got maybe two decent photos.  It was very dissapointing that I relied on this camera for all my Christmas day photos. I did take two photos at night of the full moon, which for some reason actually turned out better than photos I have taken of the moon with my Nikon SLR.So in conclusion; if all you care about is the size of your camera with no concern for picture quality, by all means this is the camera for you. Otherwise, you will quickly be sorry you purchased this little camera. So very disappointing for a camera that carries the Nikon name.

Reviews.Title: NIKON
Reviews.Author: Frank R. Campbell II
Reviews.Content: Great product and price point. New camera so haven't used it as of yet. My neighbors have 2 of these camera's and love them. I have read other reviews and made a decision based on personal knowledge of users and Amazons price and shipping history.Frank

Reviews.Title: Too Small
Reviews.Author: Angela Temple
Reviews.Content: I wanted a small camera, but this is a bit too small. Ordered it in December and have not used it yet.

Reviews.Title: Very convenient, easy to use, carries easily in any pocket.
Reviews.Author: Mark
Reviews.Content: I have a number of digital cameras.  A full size SLR, and a few other point and shoots.  My good point and shoots take better pictures than my new S01 Coolpix, but unless I'm wearing cargo pocket pants, they aren't really pocket size.  If you want an inexpensive camera, that can always be handy, this is it.  It does take very good pictures, just not excellent pictures.  It's okay in low light, but much better in daylight.  There is only a 3x's zoom, so this camera is for close up pictures.  I got exactly what I thought I would be getting; an easy to carry camera, that takes better pictures than my phone.  I'm not going to use it to photograph a wedding, or important family event, but I am going to get some good pictures that I otherwise would miss.  I like it.

Reviews.Title: Best little camera ever
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: If your looking for something to carry around with you anywhere you go, then this is the perfect camera for you! Great quality for such a small camera. It takes wonderful pictures with style. You won't be disappointed .

Reviews.Title: just wonderful
Reviews.Author: agotsky
Reviews.Content: its just right for my travel..... thank you! i don't have to worry about the bulkiness and fits right in my pocket!

Reviews.Title: Nikon COOLPIX S01
Reviews.Author: pinoyakohahaha
Reviews.Content: The camera is great for quick shots. Outdoor exposure is great but not lowlight. $99 is a good price than $179 orignally.

Reviews.Title: Good Seller
Reviews.Author: Shu Chan
Reviews.Content: Nikon COOLPIX S01 10.1 MP Digital Camera with 3x Zoom,the camera is small and good function,capture picture is fast and good focus.

Reviews.Title: hated it, took terrible pictures
Reviews.Author: BWA
Reviews.Content: I returned this right away.  It took terrible pictures.  They were all yellow and icky, reminded me of the old digital cameras.  Even in natural light they didn't look good.  They were all blury and grainy.  There was a long pause after you hit the shutter button before the photo was taken, so you pretty much missed the moment each time.  There is no memory card!  You have to do everything off the internal memory, which is not handy at all.  It's so cute, too bad I had to return it because I hated it.

Reviews.Title: Not my favorite
Reviews.Author: Sophia
Reviews.Content: I have more than my share of cameras, my big disappointment with this is that it is all internal memory, I can't remove a card and transfer to my computer or ipad, I have to wire it to the computer to transfer.  I would not recommend this for that reason.

Reviews.Title: Cute tiny camera but...
Reviews.Author: Ellen "Ellen"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera I could throw in a purse that would do better than my iPhone. This wasn't it.  It was hard to handle because it was almost too small and the photos (especially indoors) were grainy. There were no settings so it was too limited for me.  I returned it & bought a Nikon S3300 for less. It's much better-more zoom, different settings, decent flash, and I got some great action shots. The 3300 is nice complement to my SLR and fits in my purse. Buy it instead.

Reviews.Title: Cool pix
Reviews.Author: Claudia
Reviews.Content: The camera was a great size and I was very excited to use it..  I took about 5 pictures on Christmas morning and the camera froze up.  I ended up sending it back for a refund, but I do plan on ordering another like that sson and hopefully it will work properly.

Reviews.Title: Good, but......
Reviews.Author: Maciej Czyzowicz
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera, very small, ideal for girls.Great pictures but a little but doesn't work great in the dark (pictures are a little bit to dark)

Reviews.Title: Stictly for Kids!
Reviews.Author: muthu
Reviews.Content: This is nice little cute camera for kids or ladies. I feel it is lil over priced for its size and limited functionality. The Camera day shots are good and night shots are poor as expected. If u really need ultrpocketable camera and u only use in well lit area, then this cam is for you...

Reviews.Title: very cute but not great
Reviews.Author: cass
Reviews.Content: As always Amazon did a wonderful job with shipping and return!The camera is slow to take pictures and the quality is that of a camera from a phone. I was almost too small at least for me.

Reviews.Title: blurry photos
Reviews.Author: E. Nester
Reviews.Content: Very small and easy to carry.  Internal memory only is not convenient for me and photos tend to be a little blurry no matter the subject or how it is held.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price.
Reviews.Author: Edmund Aguil
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because of its size and because of this quality.  It has a great look and it took good pictures for its size.  Sadly I will be returning this camera because it will not allow me to download pictures into my iPad mini with the camera connector.  I specifically wanted this camera to use with my iPad mini when I was on the go.  The only drawbacks I found with this camera was that it did have a lag on the shutter speed even when not using the tap feature to take pictures and that the memory is unremovable which to some could be a positive.  I found it negative since I couldn't just pull out the memory and plug it into my card reader.If you're looking for a good camera with better quality than a cell phone this would be a great choice.

Reviews.Title: Loved it for 3 weeks - then it broke
Reviews.Author: justcind "Cindy"
Reviews.Content: OMG! I just bought the S01 January 1st, 2013 and I loved it, until yesterday when I turned it on and got the red exclamation point on the screen. It just won't work no matter what. The same problem as another post. I returned it and did not get another one because since it does not have a removable memory card I lost all my pictures. I decided that was a flaw I could not overlook. I was very happy with the picture quality and video while it worked. I think others had problems because they were using the touch screen to take pics. The user manual says to disable that feature and use the button instead because that makes it use the auto focus. It worked great. So sad :( But now I purchased the Sony WX50 and I am so glad I did. It is really small and light (not as small as the S01 but close enough). And the features are amazing!

Reviews.Title: The camera too small.
Reviews.Author: Lisa Lanzavecchia
Reviews.Content: I did not realize it was so small.  I thought we were purchasing a standard size camera.  The color is perfect!

Reviews.Title: Red Camera
Reviews.Author: Connie Foster
Reviews.Content: I love it. It's nicee to carry in my purse because it's little. I wanted silver but it was not avaible in 16 mega pixel.

Reviews.Title: Not good for live entertainment or action shots!
Reviews.Author: sicdoll "Jane"
Reviews.Content: Considering Nikon is praised among photographers, I decided to purchase this product! Wast of money for the line of work I use cameras for. I do music shows, night scene, concerts... etc.photos are ridiculously blurry, with squiggly lines through photos! I do not recommend this camera to anyone who would use it for live entertainment purposes!

Reviews.Title: Not ready for prime time
Reviews.Author: Robert Ross
Reviews.Content: I am a long time Nikon user, but I found this camera to be more of a toy than a tool.  Nothing about it suited me, and I finally bought a Lumix DMC-SZ-7, which actually functions as a pocket camera to suit my needs, when the Nikon D-5100 is too bulky

Reviews.Title: REALLY CRAPPY PICS
Reviews.Author: becky korby
Reviews.Content: I was so excited for this camera. Get it, and the zoom is sticky. So get another.  Now that I can take pictures.  WASTE OF MONEY! Pictures suck! Most are just a blur!!!

Reviews.Title: Nikon Coolpix Review
Reviews.Author: Diane Cairns "Target Girl"
Reviews.Content: I was not happy with the quality of the pictures this camera took.  The quality was worse than my phone.  I bought it thinking it would be better.  It's a cute little sucker and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: It was not new
Reviews.Author: hyunjung chun
Reviews.Content: When I open it there were some couple picture which taken Christmas..Just lazy to return it .. But.. Really angry... Do not buy here.

Reviews.Title: COOLPIX S01
Reviews.Author: Christopher J Oster
Reviews.Content: Picture quality not very good.  Blurry and color quality poor.  Would not recommend if you want a good quality picture

Reviews.Title: Jon's review
Reviews.Author: Jonathan D Skaggs
Reviews.Content: My daughter loves this camera. Very small which is very nice for her. Fits in her purse nicely and is easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Coolpix SO1
Reviews.Author: Eileen Wallschlaeger
Reviews.Content: Have not used very much and have yet to download to computer.  Really no opinion as of today, ask a couple of months from now.

Reviews.Title: Too small
Reviews.Author: Denise Cook
Reviews.Content: Returned and got a different Nikon as this was oigh!too small and I didn't care for the pictures it took.  I like my new one th
